uvi.description:
xen/balloon: use a kernel thread instead a workqueue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.9 by commit 922fd5b6bb13ad31ff36e86e2eba2f26d8135272. For more details please see the references link.
